name: JeanShepherdAirchecks
0:
”Alexa, open shepherd airchecks”
”Alexa, ask shepherd airchecks for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start shepherd airchecks”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: shepherd airchecks
des: You may recognize his voice as the narrator of "A Christmas Story". Long before that, master storyteller and humorist Jean Shepherd's voice graced the late-night airwaves during the 60's and 70's on WOR 710 New York. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. You can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
